example: This cake is better than the last one.
The weather today is worse than yesterday.
I have less sugar than you.
She has more books than me.
Her house is further than mine.
He is better at math now.
This one tastes worse than the other.
There is more water in this bottle.
I want less salt in my food.
We need to walk further to reach the store.
The farther we go, the colder it gets.
You can add more sugar if you like.
They have less money than before.
